actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a State or by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.

summary.text: Permits the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a State or nonprofit organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a State or by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.
